TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConfigurationProperty extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示配置元素的一个特性或子级。

span.span: Represents an attribute or a child of a configuration element.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 对于简单的 ，如下一个示例中所示的 `CustomSection`， 的对象表示属性，如 `fileName`。In the case of a simple , such as the `CustomSection` shown in the next example, the objects represent attributes such as `fileName`. 对于更复杂的配置元素（例如包含子节的节，例如 `authentication`）， 对象可以表示 对象以及属性。In the case of more complex configuration elements such as a section containing subsections, for instance `authentication`, the objects can represent objects as well as attributes. 类表示 对象的集合，这些对象可以是属性或配置元素 对象。The class represents the collection of the objects that can be either attributes or objects of a configuration element. 类表示单独的配置设置。The class represents an individual configuration setting. 此类允许你获取或设置特定配置实体（特性或元素）的名称、类型和默认值，并指定属性是必需的，是元素键，还是表示默认元素集合。This class allows you to get or set the name, type, and default value for a particular configuration entity (attribute or element) and specify whether the attribute is required, is an element key, or represents a default element collection. ## Examples 1. 下面的代码示例演示如何在创建自定义节时使用 。The following code example shows how to use the when you create a custom section. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty/CS/ConfigurationProperty.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty/VB/ConfigurationProperty.vb#1)] 下面是上一示例中的代码所使用的配置文件的摘录。The following is an excerpt of the configuration file used by the code in the previous example. ```xml
``` 下面的示例演示如何在代码中创建上一个节。The following example shows how to create the previous section in code. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty/CS/ConfigurationProperty.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty/VB/ConfigurationProperty.vb#30)]

para.span: 每个 对象都会创建一个 对象的内部 集合，这些对象表示元素特性或子元素的集合。

span.span: Every object creates an internal collection of objects that represents either the element attributes or a collection of child elements.

para.span: 不可自定义的信息和功能由 属性提供的 对象所包含。

span.span: Non-customizable information and functionality is contained by an object provided by the property.

para.span: 可以使用编程方式或声明性（特性化）编码模型创建自定义配置元素。

span.span: You can use a programmatic or a declarative (attributed) coding model to create a custom configuration element.
- Programmatic Model.

para.span: 此模型要求你为每个元素特性创建一个属性，以获取和/或设置其值，并将其添加到基础 基类的内部属性包。

span.span: This model requires that you create a property for each element attribute to get and/or set its value and add it to the internal property bag of the underlying base class.
- Declarative Model.

para.span: 这种简单的模型（也称为特性化模型）允许您通过使用属性来定义元素特性，并使用特性修饰它。

span.span: This simpler model, also called attributed model, allows you to define an element attribute by using a property and decorate it with attributes.

para.span: 这些属性指示 ASP.NET 配置系统有关属性类型及其默认值的信息。

span.span: These attributes instruct the ASP.NET configuration system about the property types and their default values.

para.span: 通过反射获取此信息，ASP.NET 配置系统会为您创建元素属性对象并执行所需的初始化。

span.span: With this information, obtained through reflection, the ASP.NET configuration system creates the element property objects for you and performs the required initialization.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数实例化 对象时， 和 属性设置为 `false`。When you instantiate a object using this constructor, the and properties are set to `false`. 此外，使用此构造函数创建的实例不会用作默认集合键属性。Additionally, an instance made with this constructor will not function as a default collection-key property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数实例化配置属性对象。The following code example shows how to use the constructor to instantiate a configuration-property object. span.span: if the property requires assembly name transformation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用包含 参数的构造函数时，可以使用 设置此属性。You use to set this property when you call a constructor that includes a parameter. 如果属性不包含程序集名称字符串，则忽略此值。This value is ignored if the property does not contain an assembly name string.

summary.span: 指示进行序列化时是否应查询配置属性的父配置节，以确定是否应将配置属性序列化到 XML 中。

span.span: Indicates whether the configuration property's parent configuration section is queried at serialization time to determine whether the configuration property should be serialized into XML.

value.span: 如果应查询父配置节，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the parent configuration section should be queried; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要为 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 或更高版本创建配置属性，并且当目标 framework 的早期版本时，不应将属性值序列化为 XML，请将此属性设置为 `true`。If you are creating a configuration property for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] or later versions, and if the property value should not be serialized to XML when an earlier version of the framework is targeted, set this property to `true`. 当调用包含 参数的构造函数时，可以使用 设置此属性。You use to set this property when you call a constructor that includes a parameter.
